short_description_localized.en: Upscale amenities and elegant furnishings define the Accessible Executive Junior Suite, with 377-494 square feet of room to relax.
short_description_localized.es: Upscale amenities and elegant furnishings define the Accessible Executive Junior Suite, with 377-494 square feet of room to relax.

description_localized.en:
Enjoy an incomparable stay in Manhattan, with elegant furnishings, upscale amenities and thoughtful conveniences.    

In this well-appointed accessible suite you’ll have all amenities needed for your convenience and comfort. Enjoy a superior stay in an ideal location, with a 34.75” entrance door, 35.25” bathroom door, and 377-494 square feet of space to relax

images.name: Handicap-Accessible-Executive-Jr.-Suite-Executive-Jr.-Suite---View-from-Sleeper-Sofa
images.caption: Executive Jr. Suite - View from Sleeper Sofa
images.description: This suite includes queen size bed, living area with sleeper sofa, arm chair, and tv.
images.alt: In the right corner of the room, a queen bed is nestled to the right of a double window. A tv rests on the wall between this window and another window, hanging above a small dresser. In front of the second window sits an arm chair. The arm chair, along with a couch perpendicular to it, surround a glass coffee table.
